original_text: And David was afraid of the Lord that day, and he said, “How can the ark of the Lord come to me?”
korean_text: 다윗이 그 날에 여호와를 두려워하여 이르되 여호와의 궤가 어찌 내게로 오리요 하고

sentences.original_text: And David was afraid of the Lord that day
How can the ark of the Lord come to me?
sentences.korean_translation: 어찌 여호와의 궤가 내게로 올 수 있으리요?
